ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: के तपाईँ आफ्नो घर जगाउन, आफ्नो गोपनीयता पुन: दावी गर्न र टिंकरहरूको विश्वव्यापी समुदायमा सामेल हुन तयार हुनुहुन्छ?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: प्रयोगकर्ता खाता सिर्जना गरेर सुरु गरौँ।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: नाम
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.helper.pas: बलियो र अनौठो पासवर्ड छान्नुहोस्। नबिर्सनको लागि निश्चित रुपमा यसलाई सेभ गर्नुहोला ।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.error.user: Username can only contain lowercase letters, and cannot contain whitespace.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: This data is stored on your Home Assistant system, though some cloud-based integrations may use this data to function.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.tit: के तपाइँ, हामीले तपाइँको स्थान पत्ता लगाएको चाहनुहुन्छ?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: हामी बाह्य सेवालाई एक पटक अनुरोध गरेर तपाईँको स्थान पत्ता लगाउन सक्छौँ।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.cou: We would like to know the country your home is in, so we can use the correct units.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: यी तपाईँको स्थानीय नेटवर्कमा पाईएको छ। केही स्वतः नै थपिएका छन्, अरूलाई अतिरिक्त कन्फिगरेसन आवश्यक हुन सक्छ।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.let: आउनुहोस्, तपाईँको निजी स्मार्ट घरको साहसिक यात्रा सुरु गरौँ।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.prefe: यसले तपाइँको प्रणाली बारे जानकारी समावेश गर्दछ।
तपाईँले Home Assistant सँग के प्रयोग गर्नुहुन्छ भन्ने विवरण
डेटाबिन्दुहरूको कुल संख्या समावेश भएको गणना।
अप्रत्याशित त्रुटिहरू हुँदा क्र्यास रिपोर्टहरू साझेदारी गर्नुहोस्।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.need_: यो विकल्प उपलब्ध हुनको लागि तपाईँले आधारभूत विश्लेषणहरू सक्षम गर्न आवश्यक छ
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.learn: हामी तपाइँको डाटा कसरी प्रशोधन गर्छौं
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.intro: Home Assistant लाई अझ राम्रो बनाउन मद्दत गर्न र स्थानीय नियन्त्रण र गोपनीयता-केन्द्रित सुविधाहरू थप्न निर्माताहरूलाई मनाउन मद्दत गर्न तपाईँको स्थापनाबाट बेनामी जानकारी साझा गर्नुहोस्।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.upload_: Upload a backup file from your device
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.unsuppo: कृपया Home Assistant ब्याकअप फाइल (.tar) छनौट गर्नुहोस्।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.details: This backup does not include your Home Assistant configuration, you cannot use it to restore your instance.
Your installation method doesn’t support apps. If you want to restore these, you have to install Home Assistant OS
The backup is encrypted. Provide the encryption key to decrypt the backup.
Home Assistant Cloud is the privacy-focused cloud. We don’t store your encryption key. Enter the encryption key you saved or use the emergency kit you have downloaded.
प्रदान गरिएको एन्क्रिप्सन कुञ्जी गलत थियो, कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.restore: Backup does not contain Home Assistant data. To restore Home Assistant you need a backup of Home Assistant Core.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.in_prog: The restore process is running in the background. Home Assistant will automatically start again once the restore is complete. Please be patient, this can take a while. Do not close or refresh this page.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.failed_: ब्याकअप पुनर्स्थापित गर्न सकिएन। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
पछिल्लो पुनर्स्थापना प्रयास असफल भयो। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
एन्क्रिप्शन कुञ्जी गलत भएकोले अन्तिम पुनर्स्थापना प्रयास असफल भयो। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.name: Backup name
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.confirm: The backup will be restored. Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 min. Home Assistant needs to shut down and the restore progress is running in the background. If it succeeds, Home Assistant will automatically start again and you see the login screen. If it fails it will bring you back to the onboarding.
Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 minutes. Home Assistant will restart and you will see the login screen when it’s restored.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.restore: Failed to start restore. Unknown error.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.cancel_: के तपाईँ पुनर्स्थापना प्रक्रिया रद्द गरेर अनबोर्डिङमा फर्कन निश्चित हुनुहुन्छ?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.ha-clou: Restore from your Home Assistant Cloud backup.
This Home Assistant Cloud account doesn’t have a backup stored. You can learn more how Cloud backups work at the Nabu Casa website.
Failed to sign out from Home Assistant cloud
Sign in to your Nabu Casa account and restore your Home Assistant Cloud backup.
You need to change your password before logging in.
You need to confirm your email before logging in.
You need to enter your two-factor authentication code.
Multi-factor authentication expired, or not started. Please try again.
Enter your email address, and we will send you a link to reset your password.
Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.options: Upload and restore a Home Assistant backup to this system
